ModMetaData.name: Ice - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: AliceTries
ModMetaData.description: Submod of Medival Times including only the ice materials for surviving on the ice sheets (This is the dev version of Ice. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
